chapter.text: 1|1|(Arambha karaicho) parama karaunamaya parama dayalu allahara namata
1|2|sakalo dharanara hamada (prasansa) bisbajagatara raba allahara babe
1|5|ami kerala tomarae'i ibadata karaom, arau tomara ocarate'i sahayya praarthana karaom
1|7|te'omlokara patha, yisakalaka tumi niyamata (anugraha) pradana karaicha, yisakalara oparata tomara kraodha aha na'i arau yisakala pathabhrasta'o nahaya
